text: University of Hawaii at Hilo - Join us and find what inspires you
At the University of Hawaiʻi Hilo, we find our inspiration in the unique community and amazing environment that surround us every day. Join us, and find what inspires you!

Welcome to the University of Hawaiʻi at Hilo
MyUH is a UH System-wide directory of services.
Choose your path to success, from a certificate to a doctorate.
View current listings of classes offered each semester.
Enjoy course-based online learning and collaboration.
Tour the beautiful UH Hilo campus individually or as a group.
Gain a sense of belonging to the campus and help you quickly become a part of campus life.
Find scholarships, grants, and more assistance while attending UH Hilo.
Estimate the cost of attending UH Hilo based on tuition and other expenses.
